abstract: Johnson & Johnson is in talks to cut the price of a $1.5 billion deal with Irish drugmaker Elan, according to press reports.
snippet: Johnson & Johnson is in talks to cut the price of a $1.5 billion deal with Irish drugmaker Elan, according to press reports.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson, the health care company, is in talks to cut the price of a $1.5 billion deal with Irish drugmaker Elan Corporation, Reuters said, citing a source familiar with the negotiations.

headline.main: J&J in Talks to Reduce Price of Elan Deal, Reports Say
